original_title: The Chieftains: Down The Old Plank Road -The Nashville Sessions in Concert
overview: This historic live concert from the Ryman features over two hours of music, behind-the-scenes interviews and more. Special guest stars include Alison Krauss, Martina McBride, Earl Scruggs, Emmylou Harris, Patty Griffin, Tim O'Brien,  Gillian Welch & David Rawlings, The Del McCoury Band and more.
title: The Chieftains: Down The Old Plank Road -The Nashville Sessions in Concert
